com.emc.esu.api

Class ObjectPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.esu.api.ObjectPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifier

    public class ObjectPath
extends java.lang.Object
implements Identifier
    Represents an object that is identified by its path in the filesystem namespace. If the object path ends in a "/", it is considered a directory object. If it does not, it is a regular object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectPath(java.lang.String path)
      Constructs a new object identifier

      Gets the name of the object (the last path component)
      int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code for this object id.
      boolean isDirectory()
      Returns true if this path represents a directory object.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the identifier as a string
